statements: SELECT * FROM online_classes
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name FROM online_classes
SELECT * FROM online_classes ORDER BY schedule_time DESC
SELECT class_topic, class_duration FROM online_classes WHERE instructor_name='John Doe'
SELECT class_name, class_duration FROM online_classes WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM online_classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name FROM online_classes WHERE class_topic = 'Math';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM online_classes WHERE class_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM online_classes ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_duration FROM online_classes WHERE class_topic LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY class_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name, class_schedule FROM classes WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, students_enrolled FROM classes WHERE students_enrolled > 20;
SELECT assessment_name, due_date, total_marks FROM assessments WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE total_marks >= 50;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE teacher_id = 1 ORDER BY class_name DESC
SELECT class_name, students_enrolled FROM classes WHERE students_enrolled > 20
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE due_date > '2021-12-31' AND total_marks BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT a.assessment_name, a.total_marks, c.class_name FROM assessments a JOIN classes c ON a.class_id = c.class_id
SELECT class_name, COUNT(assessment_id) AS num_assessments FROM classes LEFT JOIN assessments ON classes.class_id = assessments.class_id GROUP BY class_name ORDER BY num_assessments DESC
SELECT * FROM Online_Classes;
SELECT class_name, class_time FROM Online_Classes;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM Online_Classes WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_name, due_date, max_score FROM Assessments WHERE max_score >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Online_Classes;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM Online_Classes WHERE class_date >= CURDATE();
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE class_id IN (SELECT class_id FROM Online_Classes WHERE class_date = '2022-12-31');
SELECT class_name, class_time FROM Online_Classes ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, class_name FROM Students JOIN Online_Classes ON Students.class_id = Online_Classes.class_id ORDER BY student_name ASC, class_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM classes;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM classes WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE class_id = 1 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grades.grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM classes ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC;
SELECT class_name, assessment_name, grade FROM classes c JOIN assessments a ON c.class_id = a.class_id JOIN grades g ON a.assessment_id = g.assessment_id WHERE g.grade >= 90;

SELECT student_name, assessment_name, grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id JOIN assessments a ON g.assessment_id = a.assessment_id WHERE a.assessment_date = '2022-10-31';
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM grades;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS num_assessments FROM classes c JOIN assessments a ON c.class_id = a.class_id GROUP BY class_name ORDER BY num_assessments DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClassSchedule;
SELECT class_name, start_time FROM ClassSchedule WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM Teacher ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Student WHERE grade_level > 5;
SELECT assessment_type, date_conducted FROM Assessment WHERE class_id = 3 ORDER BY date_conducted DESC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM ClassSchedule WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, email FROM Student WHERE grade_level > 5 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM Teacher WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_type, date_conducted FROM Assessment WHERE class_id = 2;
